Package ctig

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AffiliationPicker
    Class used for picking religious affiliation
    CityListPicker
    Used to pick a city from a list by population/weight
    ColorLookup
    A lookup table for mapping color names to RGBA colors
    ColorMatcher
    A list of colors that match the given primary color
    ColorTable
    A table of color matches for selecting 2-color schemes
    CtiFactory
    factory class to generate college team information
    CtigGui
    The main GUI for the college team information generator.
    HelmetMaker
    Used to make a helmet graphic to display in the CTIG team table.
    ListPicker<T>
    Generic class used to pick an item from the list; most pickers in CTIG use this base class
    LocationPicker
    Class to pick a location from a list of cities and states
    NameListPicker
    class for picking a name from a list of personal names
    OperatorPicker
    Used to pick a school operator (public, private, military, etc.) from a list of operators.
    PersonNamePicker
    Used to pick a person's first and last name based on gender and language.
    SchoolNameFactory
    Factory class for generating university names based on grammar rules define in docs/grammar.txt.
    SchoolNameSelWeights
    Used for specifying custom school name selection weights, which govern probabilities in generating school names.
    SpecialtyPicker
    a class to pick a school specialty
    StateListPicker
    Used to pick a state from a list of states
    SymbolAdjectivePicker
    Used to pick religious symbol adjectives (like "Holy" or "Blessed") from a list.
    SymbolNounPicker
    Used to pick religious symbol nouns (like "Cross" or "Lady") from a list.
    TeamAdjectivePicker
    Used to pick team adjectives (like "Fighting" or "Running") from a list.
    TeamNicknamePicker
    Used to pick a team nickname from a list.
    TeamRow
    Represents the row of a team in the GUI - grid version.
    TeamTableRow
    Represents the row of a team in the GUI - table version.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    PersonNamePicker.GenderType  
    PersonNamePicker.NameType  
    PersonNamePicker.OriginType
